sentences: Osman Sınav (born 1956) is a Turkish director, producer and screenwriter.
He studied Art and also finished courses in Textile Design, cinema and television at the Istanbul State Fine Arts Academy.
He worked as a copywriter from 1979-1980 and from 1980-1984, worked in the Grafika Lintas Advertising agency.
In 1984, he founded his production company Sinegraf.
In 2012, he received a special degree in cinema and television from Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University.
